name: Casa Brands
overview:
BONITA is flagship brand from the house of Casa Brands India Pvt. Ltd. “Casa Brands India Pvt Ltd” is a well-known entity established in the year 2007, at New Delhi (India).

Our Product Range : Our company is a prominent manufacturer, exporter and supplier of a wide assortment of Home utility and home care products such as Storage Products, Kitchen Products, Textiles and Decorative products.

Team;’ We have recruited dexterous team of professionals, who help us in offering the finest quality assortment of Household Items, Storage Products, Kitchen Products, Textiles and Decorative Items.

Quality Policy: Leveraging on our set universal norms, we have been able to satisfy clients that are spread all across the world. We manufacture our products in accordance with the defined international standards and norms.

Client Satisfaction: Due to our outstanding quality range of Household Items, Storage Products, Kitchen Products, Textiles and Decorative Items, we have expanded our huge client base that are spread all across the globe.
